ygData.subject: Re: Woohoo...
ygData.msgSnippet: one question.  is this a bannable exploit?  will Verant take away all the plat we made in selling these sketches?  i know that they monitor all purchases,
ygData.messageBody:
one question. is this a bannable exploit? will Verant take away all the
plat we made in selling these sketches? i know that they monitor all
purchases, which is how they know if potions are being bought or not.

Keith C. Estanol / storm@... / Systems Administration
Linux / Quake2 Weapons Factory / Lawful Evil

On Tue, 27 Jul 1999, Z.M. Kulik wrote:

> From: "Z.M. Kulik" <direhawk@...>
>
> Good news
> Pie tin sketches sells back to the vendor for 4gp...!!!!
> wow.. thats over 1000pp profit..:))
> on the down side this is the LAST time we saw easy money from pottery,
> oh well it was good until lasted....
